0x4046B66.name: GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE

params.name: vehicle
params.description: The vehicle to obtain data for.

0x4046B66.description:
Returns vehicle's wheels' size (size is the same for all the wheels, cannot get/set specific wheel of vehicle).
Only works on non-default wheels (returns 0 in case of default wheels).
0x4046B66.resultsDescription: Float representing size of the wheel (usually between 0.5 and 1.5)
